org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.attackgraph

Class AttackPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.attackgraph.AttackGraph
      • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.attackgraph.MulvalAttackGraph
        • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.attackgraph.AttackPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class AttackPath
extends MulvalAttackGraph
implements Cloneable
    Class used to represent an attack path. An attack path is in fact a special attack graph with several leaves and one goal
    Author:
    Francois-Xavier Aguessy

      • computeRemediationToPathWithLeafRemediations

        private static List<List<RemediationAction>> computeRemediationToPathWithLeafRemediations(List<Vertex> leavesToCorrect,
                                                                         int indexInPath,
                                                                         HashMap<Integer,List<List<RemediationAction>>> howToRemediateLeaves)
        Parameters:
        leavesToCorrect - the list of leaves that should be corrected
        indexInPath - the index where we are in the list of leaves
        howToRemediateLeaves - a vector of how each leaf can be corrected
        Returns:
        The list of remediation actions : A1 OR A2 OR A3 where A1 = A1.1 AND A1.2 AND A1.3 ...

      • getRemediationAction

        public List<List<RemediationAction>> getRemediationAction(InformationSystem topology,
                                                 Connection conn,
                                                 String costParametersFolder)
                                                   throws Exception
        Parameters:
        topology - the network topology
        conn - database connection
        Returns:
        the list of possible remediation actions to remediate this attack path : remediation[1] OR remediation[2] OR remediation[3] ; remediation[1] = remediation[1][1] AND remediation[1][2]...
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getRemedationActions

        public List<List<RemediationAction>> getRemedationActions(InformationSystem topology,
                                                 Connection conn,
                                                 String costParametersFolder)
                                                   throws Exception
        Parameters:
        topology - the network topology
        conn - database connection
        Returns:
        the list of possible remediation actions to remediate this attack path : remediation[1] OR remediation[2] OR remediation[3] ; remediation[1] = remediation[1][1] AND remediation[1][2]... [Withour snort rules]
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getDeployableRemediations

        public List<DeployableRemediation> getDeployableRemediations(InformationSystem topology,
                                                    Connection conn,
                                                    String costParametersFolder)
                                                      throws Exception
        Parameters:
        topology - the network topology
        conn - the database connection
        costParametersFolder - the folder where the cost parameters are stored
        Returns:
        the list of deployable remediations without snort rules
        Throws:
        Exception

      • computeScoring

        public void computeScoring()
        This function compute the scoring of this attack path (float between 0 and 1 : 1 = will arrive ; 0 = can't arrive

                   InformationSystem topology,
                   Connection conn)
                     throws Exception

        topology - the network topology

      • getRemediationActionForLeaf

        public List<List<RemediationAction>> getRemediationActionForLeaf(Vertex leaf,
                                                        InformationSystem topology,
                                                        Connection conn,
                                                        String costParametersFolder)
                                                          throws Exception
        Parameters:
        leaf - An attack path leaf
        topology - the network topology
        conn - the database connection
        Returns:
        the possible remediation action to remediate this leaf. To remediate the leaf, we can apply remediation[1] OR remadiation[2] OR remediation[3] the remediation[1] is remediation[1][1] AND remediation[1][2] AND remediation[1][3] etc...
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getRemediationActionForLeaf

        public List<List<RemediationAction>> getRemediationActionForLeaf(Vertex leaf,
                                                        InformationSystem topology,
                                                        Connection conn,
                                                        String costParametersFolder,
                                                        boolean useSnortRule)
                                                          throws Exception
        Parameters:
        leaf - An attack path leaf
        topology - the network topology
        conn - the database connection
        useSnortRule - : if true, use the snort rules else don't use it for remediation
        Returns:
        the possible remediation action to remediate this leaf. To remediate the leaf, we can apply remediation[1] OR remadiation[2] OR remediation[3] the remediation[1] is remediation[1][1] AND remediation[1][2] AND remediation[1][3] etc...
        Throws:
        Exception

        public boolean leafMandatoryForGoal(Vertex leaf)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • leavesMandatoryForVertex

        private boolean leavesMandatoryForVertex(List<Vertex> leaves,
                               Vertex v,
                               List<Vertex> alreadySeen)
        Recursive function that test whether or not leaves are mandatory to access a vertex
        Parameters:
        leaves - the leaves that will be tested
        v - the vertex
        Returns:
        true if the leaves are mandatory / else false
